channel.title: Disruptive Innovation on
channel.description: Recent content in Disruptive Innovation on

item.title: Apple: iPhone 14, Watch 8, and Sustaining Innovation
item.author: info@dataingenio.com (Tama Francisquez)
item.description: On the 7th of September, Apple held its “Far Out” iPhone event. New iPhones, Apple Watches, and AirPods were announced, each coming with a plethora of features. Yes, all of it was innovation, but none of it brought the kind of excitement Apple used to. Why is that? And why probably this is the best strategy for Apple.

item.title: The Future of the Nintendo Switch
item.author: info@dataingenio.com (Tama Francisquez)
item.description: Nintendo achieved something truly amazing with the launch of the Switch. It was able to disrupt itself and the entire gaming industry while saving itself from doom. How exactly was Nintendo able to do it and what comes next in that story?
